Package dao

Class ParagrapheDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO
dao.ParagrapheDAO
public class ParagrapheDAO
extends AbstractDAO
This is a DAO class that interacts with the data base concerning the paragraphs treatments
Author:
mounsit kaddami yan perez

    this method allows to define a paragraph as a next for a given paragraph, it stores in fact the next paragraph in the paragraph as a choice with a default text 'Paragraphe suivante'

    allows to define a paragraph is the data base as a body paragraph

    this method allows to get all the information stored in the data base about a paragraph identified by the given parameters

    • associateNextParagraph

      public int associateNextParagraph​(java.lang.String titleStory, int idPar, java.lang.String titleNext, int idParNext)
      this method allows to define a paragraph as a next for a given paragraph, it stores in fact the next paragraph in the paragraph as a choice with a default text 'Paragraphe suivante'
      Parameters:
      titleStory - : defines the current paragraph
      idPar - : defines the current paragraph
      titleNext - : defines the paragraph which the user had chosen as a next for the paragraph he's writing
      idParNext - : defines the paragraph which the user had chosen as a next for the paragraph he's writing
      Returns:

    • deleteParagraphe

      public boolean deleteParagraphe​(java.lang.String title, int idParagraph)
      delete the paragraph from the data base : the paragraph is deleted only if it has not any choice that's written or in process of writing
      Parameters:
      title -
      idParagraph -
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates if the paragraph is deleted or not

    • turnIntoOneParagraph

      public Paragraphe turnIntoOneParagraph​(java.lang.String titleStory, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> idPars)
      this method takes a list of paragraphs and groups there texts in one text and stores the names of all the authors
      Parameters:
      titleStory -
      idPars - : the list of the paragraphs to convert into on paragraph
      Returns:
      an object of class Paragraphe that stores all the paragraphs texts and authors
